config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _journalDiskSync configuration option is used in the code to determine whether the journal should sync to disk. If _transientMode is false, a PersistentJournal is created with the _journalDiskSync option passed as a parameter.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _journalDiskSync configuration depends on the usage of the journal. If the journal is frequently written to, the sync to disk operation will be triggered more often.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _journalDiskSync configuration option on the system is significant. Enabling sync to disk ensures data durability but can also impact performance due to the disk I/O operations required for syncing.
